page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW
page.content: Our area is an industrial area in the County of{Cleveland.}The section covered in the survey is mainly residential.The area has four definite boundaries. To the South it is skirted by the Cleveland Hills,to the North by the{British Steel Corporation's Clay {Lane}and{Lackenby}works along the banks of the{River Tees,}to the East by the giant chemical complex of the {Imperial Chemical Industries}and finally to the West by the outskirts of{Middlesbrough.}The coastal resorts of{Redcar}and{Saltburn}are but a few miles away as is the{North York Moors} National Park. Communications are good with its own port,ever improving road links and an airport just 13 miles away.
